plot: A young, naive lawyer spends a month working on the reception of his uncle's brothel. He soon finds that the job is more purgatory than paradise.
title: A Spanking in Paradise
plot_es: A young, naive lawyer spends a month working on the reception of his uncle's brothel. He soon finds that the job is more purgatory than paradise.
plot_en: A young, naive lawyer spends a month working on the reception of his uncle's brothel. He soon finds that the job is more purgatory than paradise.
